metadata.title: CVE-2024-21823 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Hardware logic with insecure de-synchronization in Intel(R) DSA andIntel(R) IAA for some Intel(R) 4th or 5th generation Xeon(R) processors mayallow an authorized user to potentially enable denial of service via localaccess.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
